taxon_identification.other_info_on_name: [For Jean Nicholas Nicollet, 1786–1843, “…who spent several years in exploring the country watered by the Mississippi and Missouri rivers, and who was employed by the United States Government in a survey of the region….” Quoted from protologue.]

bio:treatment.discussion: Nicolletia trifida Rydberg is known from Baja California and Baja California Sur, Mexico.

references.reference: Strother, J. L. 1978. Taxonomy and geography of Nicolletia (Compositae: Tageteae). Sida 7: 369–374.
